Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute near 83rd/Holland
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near 83rd/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near 83rd/Holland.

Northbound buses will operate via 87th, State, 83rd and Vincennes including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, 87th and Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Exchange/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound  71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Yates and 73rd: due to, street blockage near Exchange/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Yates and 73rd: due to, street blockage near Exchange/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Kolin
ShortDescription: Eastbound 66 Chicago  buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago Ave, Kostner, Augusta, Pulaski and Chicago Ave: due to, street blockage near Chicago Ave/Kolin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
